languages.text: {n}Возможно, если бы оружие было у вас в руках — у вас были бы шансы опередить бродягу. Но к тому моменту, когда вы достаете пистолет из снаряжения, в лицо вам уже смотрит ствол пистолета в руке бродяги.{/n} "На шпилях не принято далеко убирать оружие — вот тебе урок на будущее. Короткое будущее, если сейчас же не свалишь".

{n}Perhaps if you had been holding your weapon from the start, you would have had a chance to beat the beggar to the draw. Instead, by the time you pull out your pistol, you are already staring down the barrel of the pistol in his hand.{/n} "Here's a lesson for you: it's considered bad taste in the spires to rummage for your weapon for too long. Except this lesson won't do you much good, unless you clear off right now."
languages.original_text: {n}Возможно, если бы оружие было у вас в руках — у вас были бы шансы опередить бродягу. Но к тому моменту, когда вы достаете пистолет из снаряжения, в лицо вам уже смотрит ствол пистолета в руке бродяги.{/n} "На шпилях не принято далеко убирать оружие — вот тебе урок на будущее. Короткое будущее, если сейчас же не свалишь".

languages.text: {n}もしかしたら、最初から武器を手に持っていたら、乞食と引き分けに持ち込むチャンスがあったかもしれない。だがそうはならず、あなたがピストルを引き抜くころには、既に相手はこちらに銃口を向けていた。{/n}「いいか、尖頭ではゆっくり時間をかけて武器を探すなんてのはお勧めしない。ただしこの教訓は、今すぐ実行しなけりゃ、何の役にも立たないがな」
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps if you had been holding your weapon from the start, you would have had a chance to beat the beggar to the draw. Instead, by the time you pull out your pistol, you are already staring down the barrel of the pistol in his hand.{/n} "Here's a lesson for you: it's considered bad taste in the spires to rummage for your weapon for too long. Except this lesson won't do you much good, unless you clear off right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}もしかしたら、最初から武器を手に持っていたら、乞食と引き分けに持ち込むチャンスがあったかもしれない。だがそうはならず、あなたがピストルを引き抜くころには、既に相手はこちらに銃口を向けていた。{/n}「いいか、尖頭ではゆっくり時間をかけて武器を探すなんてのはお勧めしない。ただしこの教訓は、今すぐ実行しなけりゃ、何の役にも立たないがな」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}如果你从一开始就拿着武器，说不定你可以赶在那个乞丐拔枪之前瞄准他。可现在，当你准备拔枪的时候，他手中的枪管已经对准了你。{/n}“给你个教训——在尖塔上，找武器找得太久是件相当要命的事情。除非你现在赶紧滚蛋，否则就算你学到了这个教训，恐怕也没机会用了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps if you had been holding your weapon from the start, you would have had a chance to beat the beggar to the draw. Instead, by the time you pull out your pistol, you are already staring down the barrel of the pistol in his hand.{/n} "Here's a lesson for you: it's considered bad taste in the spires to rummage for your weapon for too long. Except this lesson won't do you much good, unless you clear off right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}如果你从一开始就拿着武器，说不定你可以赶在那个乞丐拔枪之前瞄准他。可现在，当你准备拔枪的时候，他手中的枪管已经对准了你。{/n}“给你个教训——在尖塔上，找武器找得太久是件相当要命的事情。除非你现在就能想个办法解决我们之间的问题，否则就算你学到了这个教训，恐怕也没机会用了。”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Quizá si hubieras tenido el arma en la mano desde el principio habrías tenido la oportunidad de ganarle la partida al mendigo. En vez de eso, para cuando sacas tu pistola ya te has encontrado con el cañón de la suya.{/n} «He aquí una lección para usted: en las torres se considera de mal gusto buscar tu arma durante demasiado tiempo. Esta lección no le servirá de mucho a menos que se largue ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps if you had been holding your weapon from the start, you would have had a chance to beat the beggar to the draw. Instead, by the time you pull out your pistol, you are already staring down the barrel of the pistol in his hand.{/n} "Here's a lesson for you: it's considered bad taste in the spires to rummage for your weapon for too long. Except this lesson won't do you much good, unless you clear off right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Quizá si hubieras tenido el arma en la mano desde el principio habrías tenido la oportunidad de ganarle la partida al mendigo. En vez de eso, para cuando sacas tu pistola ya te has encontrado con el cañón de la suya.{/n} «He aquí una lección para usted: en las torres se considera de mal gusto buscar tu arma durante demasiado tiempo. Esta lección no le servirá de mucho a menos que se largue ahora mismo».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Wenn du deine Waffe von Anfang an in der Hand gehalten hättest, hättest du vielleicht eine Chance gehabt, schneller zu ziehen als der Bettler. So aber starrst du längst in den Lauf seiner Pistole, bevor du deine herausgezogen hast.{/n} "Kleine Lektion für Euch: In den Türmen gilt es als unhöflich, zu lange nach seiner Waffe herumzukramen. Nur wird Euch diese Lektion nicht viel helfen, wenn Ihr nicht jetzt sofort verschwindet."
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps if you had been holding your weapon from the start, you would have had a chance to beat the beggar to the draw. Instead, by the time you pull out your pistol, you are already staring down the barrel of the pistol in his hand.{/n} "Here's a lesson for you: it's considered bad taste in the spires to rummage for your weapon for too long. Except this lesson won't do you much good, unless you clear off right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Wenn du deine Waffe von Anfang an in der Hand gehalten hättest, hättest du vielleicht eine Chance gehabt, schneller zu ziehen als der Bettler. So aber starrst du längst in den Lauf seiner Pistole, bevor du deine herausgezogen hast.{/n} "Kleine Lektion für Euch: In den Türmen gilt es als unhöflich, zu lange nach seiner Waffe herumzukramen. Nur wird Euch diese Lektion nicht viel helfen, wenn Ihr nicht jetzt sofort abschwirrt."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Peut-être que si vous aviez tenu votre arme depuis le début, vous auriez eu une chance de dégainer plus vite que le mendiant. Hélas, à peine avez-vous esquissé le geste de fouiller vos vêtements que vous vous retrouvez nez à nez avec le canon de son pistolet.{/n} « Voilà une leçon à retenir : dans les tours, on considère que c'est de mauvais goût de mettre trop de temps à défourailler. Mais bon, à moins de la mettre en pratique dès maintenant, vous allez pas la retenir bien longtemps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps if you had been holding your weapon from the start, you would have had a chance to beat the beggar to the draw. Instead, by the time you pull out your pistol, you are already staring down the barrel of the pistol in his hand.{/n} "Here's a lesson for you: it's considered bad taste in the spires to rummage for your weapon for too long. Except this lesson won't do you much good, unless you clear off right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Peut-être que si vous aviez tenu votre arme depuis le début, vous auriez eu une chance de dégainer plus vite que le mendiant. Hélas, à peine avez-vous initié le geste de fouiller vos vêtements que vous vous retrouvez nez à nez avec le canon de son pistolet.{/n} « Voilà une leçon à retenir : dans les tours, on considère que c'est de mauvais goût de mettre trop de temps à défourailler. Mais bon, à moins de la mettre en pratique dès maintenant, vous allez pas la retenir bien longtemps. »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}En başından elin silahında olsaydı belki dilenciden hızlı davranabilirdin. Fakat tabancanı çekene kadar kendini onun namlusunun ucunda buluyorsun.{/n} "Sana ders olsun. Silahını doğrultmakta yavaş kalmak, kulelerde yapma lüksünün olmadığı bir hatadır. Gerçi hemen kaybolmazsan bu dersin sana bir faydası olmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps if you had been holding your weapon from the start, you would have had a chance to beat the beggar to the draw. Instead, by the time you pull out your pistol, you are already staring down the barrel of the pistol in his hand.{/n} "Here's a lesson for you: it's considered bad taste in the spires to rummage for your weapon for too long. Except this lesson won't do you much good, unless you clear off right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Başından beri silahını tutuyor olsaydın belki dilenciden hızlı davranabilirdin. Fakat tabancanı çekene kadar kendini onun namlusunun ucunda buluyorsun.{/n} "Sana ders olsun. Silahını uzun süre aramak, kulelerde uygunsuz bir davranış olarak algılanır. Gerçi hemen kaybolmazsan bu dersin sana bir faydası olmayacak."
traits.speaker: TrampMain
